author: Douglas Brookman, Director of Operations
title: The Lucerne Hotel Announces a New Year’s Special Offer
text:
Situated in a landmark building on Manhattan’s Upper West Side, The Lucerne Hotel announces a special New Year’s offer , encouraging guests to make 2016 even sweeter with an escape to New York City. In addition to the property’s prime location just moments away from Central Park, museums and unparalleled dining and nightlife, The Lucerne Hotel offers unmatched access to some of the most iconic New Year’s Eve celebrations in New York City, including the famous ball drop at Times Square. In addition to an elegantly appointed guestroom, guests who take advantage of this special offer and stay two or more nights will receive up to 20% off, a complimentary bottle of Prosecco, 20% off spa services, 15% off breakfast, complimentary Wi-Fi and daily wine hour. This offer is valid for stays from December 24th to January 15th.
“We’re hoping that this year our guests will take advantage of all of the wonder that Manhattan – and particularly the Upper West Side – has to offer during the holiday season and through New Year’s,” said Douglas Brookman, Director of Operations. “In addition to boasting one of the most coveted locations in New York City, we’re eager to welcome our guests with a sophisticated ambiance and modern comforts to help ensure that 2016 is a sweet year for all. That’s why we’re so proud to offer this special promotion, giving everyone a chance to enjoy a sweet start to the New Year.”
To learn more about this special offer or to book a stay guests can visit The Lucerne Hotel online .
About The Lucerne Hotel:
Housed in a landmark building erected in 1904, The Lucerne Hotel is a luxury NYC hotel located on the Upper West Side of Manhattan within walking of the American Museum of Natural History, the Lincoln Center, Riverside Park and Central Park. The hotel is home to 202 elegant rooms and suites with complimentary Wi-Fi and 24-hour room service. Property features include dining at Nice Matin, in-house spa-treatments and a daily wine reception.
